definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Monk of deficient is Shaolin Temple abbot, law order nocturnal emission.

sentences.english: And if any man's seed of copulation go out from him， then he shall wash all his flesh in water， and be unclean until the even.
sentences.chinese: 人若夢遺，他必不潔淨到晚上，並要用水洗全身。

sentences.english: Sometimes this happens through nocturnal emissions, which are commonly called wet dreams.

sentences.english: If he was asleep when hyperaemia , the likelihood produces nocturnal emission.
